repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains issues of Periscope which contains news and articles about human resources issues. The stories emphasize the human resouces aspects of working at Tufts.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Department of Personnel: Started in 1966. First director was Viola Saltmarsh, former Director of Placement. Personnel functions prior to this department were under the purview of the Director of Placement and the Placement Office which was looks like a predecessor of Student Services/Career Counseling. The Department of Personnel changed its name to the Department of Human Resources in 1988 (or Human Resources Division per the Annual Report of the President to the Trustees, November 4, 1988)

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research
